title: Elegant Emerald and Diamond Haaram - A Timeless Treasure
materials: Natural Emeralds (Panna). Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster and longevity.
features: This stunning Haaram showcases a classic layered design, meticulously handcrafted in the traditional Telugu style. Features an intricately designed floral pendant with a central Emerald, surrounded by Polki diamonds. Delicate gold ghungroo-style drops add movement and charm. The adjustable chain allows for a comfortable and versatile fit.
colors: with the vibrant green of Emeralds and the dazzling white of Uncut Diamonds. A regal and auspicious color combination.
occasions: or any grand celebration. A statement piece that will elevate any traditional attire.
description: A true investment piece, this Haaram embodies timeless elegance and cultural heritage. The use of high-quality materials, including 22K gold and genuine Emeralds, ensures lasting beauty and value. The exquisite craftsmanship reflects the rich tradition of Hyderabadi jewelry making, making it a unique and cherished heirloom.
